nodes.text: Cuffbands, also restraining bands, were a type of personal restraining device, similar to binders. In 3.5 ABY, the Rebels Princess Leia Organa, Lando Calrissian, and Chewbacca once restrained the Human replica droid Guri by binding her wrists with cuffbands. Guri, however, merely used her brute droid strength to break out of her restraints.
